| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [monst.c#line2814](/wiki/Monst.c#line2814 "Monst.c") |

The **shark**, ;, is a [sea monster](/wiki/Sea_monster "Sea monster") in [NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack"). Unlike its more powerful [eel](/wiki/Eel "Eel") brethren, it does not possess a [drowning](/wiki/Drowning "Drowning") attack; it does however possess a fairly powerful biting attack. There are always several sharks and [giant eels](/wiki/Giant_eel "Giant eel") generated in the [castle](/wiki/Castle "Castle") [moat](/wiki/Moat "Moat").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Shark\&action=edit)*

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Shark

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
; shark
Difficulty 9
Attacks Bite 5d6
; shark
Difficulty 9
Attacks

Bite 5d6

Base level 7
Base experience 104
Speed 12
Base AC 2
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 500
Nutritional value 350
Size Large
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A shark:

  • can swim.
  • can survive underwater.
  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • is an animal.
  • has a serpent body.
  • has a thick hide.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
Reference monst.c#line2814

The shark, ;, is a sea monster in NetHack. Unlike its more powerful eel brethren, it does not possess a drowning attack; it does however possess a fairly powerful biting attack. There are always several sharks and giant eels generated in the castle moat.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

The '''shark''', {{monsym|shark}}, is a [[sea monster]] in [[NetHack]].  Unlike its more powerful [[eel]] brethren, it does not possess a [[drowning]] attack; it does however possess a fairly powerful biting attack.  There are always several sharks and [[giant eel]]s generated in the [[castle]] [[moat]].
